/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a pedestrian's perspective on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The intersection is teeming with vehicles, including cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a muted light over the scene. In the distance, the cityscape is dotted with tall buildings and construction cranes, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
